entry.value: SAM (Significance Analysis of Microarrays) is a non-parametric permutation-based statistical test for determination of significantly changed genes (proteins) in experiment as originally proposed in Tusher et al. (2001; Proc.Natl.Acad.Sci.).%%00010%%00010The input is a wide-format table with log2 transformed and normalized intensities, where rows correspond to individual proteins, and columns correspond to samples. Currently, the node supports only 2 conditions comparison (number of replicates is not limited). User should provide the experimental design, corresponding to column order - important is, that user should provide the design using only numbers 1 or 2 (e.g. control, control, treated, treated would be transferred as 1, 1, 2, 2). Furthermore, user provides a contrast of interest in the format as "1-2". The only supported response format is currently "Two class (unpaired)".%%00010%%00010For the output, user is provided with log2 fold change and p-values.%%00010%%00010Other options in the form comprise also use of delta value for significantly changed proteins denoting, but currently this option is deprecated - the node will run, but please, do not rely on the results yet.%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010=================%%00010%%00010Used programs and tools and their respective licenses at the time of the metanode creation. Version numbers and the licenses might differ based on your local installation. Please inspect your local installation and contact us if you can not locate your local version and or license terms.%%00010%%00010KNIME nodes (The KNIME nodes consists of the following GNU GPL 3.0 License. Licence terms are available here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)%%00010Python 3 (The Python consists of the following Python 3.6 License. Licence terms are available here: https://docs.python.org/3.6/license.html)%%00010R (The R consists of the following GNU General Public Licences. Licence terms are available here: https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/)%%00010R package samr (The limma consists of the following General Public License (GPL), version 2 license. Licence terms are available here: https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/GPL-2)%%00010%%00010The metanode was created in KNIME 4.1.3 running inside the docker image (https://hub.docker.com/r/cfprot/knime/), tag 4.1.3a.%%00010%%00010=================%%00010%%00010This version of metanode is available under the GNU GPL 3.0 License, unless stated otherwise. The full version of the license terms is available at https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html.%%00010Version: 0.0.1 from 2021-10-15%%00010Contact person: Kristina Gomoryova (kgomory@gmail.com)%%00010More information can be found at https://github.com/OmicsWorkflows/KNIME_metanodes.
input table containing data columns to be compared
output dataframe containing input table plus newly computed columns or new columns only
